results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1+x-x^2+x^3).
comment: Absolute values give coordination sequence for (3,infinity,infinity) tiling of hyperbolic plane. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 29 2015
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
J. W. Cannon, P. Wagreich, Growth functions of surface groups, Mathematische Annalen, 1992, Volume 293, pp. 239-257. See Prop. 3.1.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,1,-1).
program: (MAGMA) [n le 3 select -n*(-1)^n else -Self(n-1)+Self(n-2)-Self(n-3): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 30 2015
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
